Title: Relates to family leave related to active service in the New York national guard
Summary: Permits family leave benefits related to the active service of a spouse, domestic partner, child, or parent of the employee in the New York national guard during a declared state of emergency or other ordered active state service.
LawCode: Amd ยง201, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to coverage for benefits under family leave related to national guard deployment during a state of emergency
